exclusion.criterion: Have taken antibiotics, except for syphilis or gonorrhea, within the last 2 weeks.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Are allergic to penicillin, ampicillin, erythromycin, or metronidazole.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has persistent feelings of sadness and loss of interest in activities. She also lost her appetite and weight.
